Three postcards from the Egyptian Museum [Museum of Cairo]. Top: Wooden models of soldiers of Mesehti, Egyptian Pikemen, Middle Kingdom, 11th Dynasty. Bottom Left: A statue of Senusret. Bottom Right: A statue of Amenhotep, son of Hapu.
